name: Power engineer / DC Chief engineer
description:
Responsibilities

  • Site survey, Development of the concept for engineering infrastructure of DataCenter;
  • Design the proper solution of power supply system (uninterruptable and guarantee system): Consept, HLD, LLD, acceptance tests, complex tests;
  • Control of incoming design documentation for compliance with Russian rules and regulations;
  • Support of the sales process;
  • Control over the fulfillment of the purchase order, shipment, etc.;
  • Control over fulfillment of construction;
  • Coordination of work with representatives of the general designer, contractors and other structures on project implementation issues;
  • Interaction with internal services of the company;
  • Preparation of activities for promotion of solutions and services, including presentations.

Requirements:

  • Experience in DataCenter design engineer of power supply system position more than 5 years
  • Experience in DataCenter SA position more than 5 years and know all cost structure including the equipment and service.
  • Successful story for design and implementation of DataCenter with total capacity >2MW for last 5 Y, including control of implementation at site
  • At least one project has an Uptime Certificate
  • UPS startup certificate: Schneider (APC, MGE), Delta, Eaton
  • Uptime designer certificate
  • Knowledge of Russian and international requirements and standards in the design and construction of Data Centers and structure of engineer systems of DataCenter (Low voltage, Medium voltage);
  • Design the proper solution of power supply system (uninterruptable and guarantee system): Consept, HLD, LLD, acceptance tests, complex tests;
  • Knowledge of the principles of construction HVAC (Heating, Ventilation, Air Cooling);
  • Knowledge of the process of obtaining technical conditions for connection of communications, approval of projects in Rostekhnadzor, experience in putting electrical installations into operation;
  • Market knowledge of major equipment manufacturers (Diesel, Switchboard, UPS etc);
  • Experience in commission of UPS/DC station;
  • Preparation of activities for promotion of solutions and services, including presentations;
  • Cost estimation for proper system (Equipment + service)

Conditions

  • Competitive salary level and remuneration package – will be discussed with the successful candidate
  • Professional and career development opportunity.
  • Commercial medical and life insurance (after probation).
  • Mobile allowance.
